summary:
Humanoid Snow Elf Race, with 3 mountable summons 
Custom body textures with Tatoo art. 
Call of the Falmer Power will grant you night vision, with invulnerablity & the ability to resurrect any NPC. (Female Vampire wings are more petite in this version)
descriptionHtml:
Requires [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37584/]MontyX\'s Race Compatability Mod (MXRC)[/url]

Does not require Dawnguard. 
 .
OPTIONAL FILE TO REMOVE VAMPIRE WINGS

FOR NO BUGS WITH VAMPIRE LORD MORPHING.
DO NOT SWITCH TO THIS RACE AS A VAMPIRE.
MAKE SURE YOU SAVE YOUR GAME ON FIRST USE OF THIS MOD.
EXIT SKYRIM, THEN RELOAD THE SAVED GAME.
THIS WILL ALLOW FOR THE SCRIPTS TO ADDJUST.
Sorry, but I have to make it clear. 

DON\'T ACTIVATE MORE THAN ONE CUSTOM RACE WHEN FIRST USING MXRC.
If you want to use more than one race with MXRC.
only add one at a time INBETWEEN SAVING & RELOADING Skyrim.
otherwise the Race scripts will add them in the Racelists in the wrong order.
Causing you to turn in to the wrong Custom Vampire Race, or be Cured as the wrong Race.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is a Redux Version - Is not compatible with the one on the Steam Workshop.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Humanoid Snow Elf Race, with 3 mountable summons (See Pictures) 
Custom body textures with Tatoo art. 
Call of the Falmer Power will grant you night vision, with invulnerablity & the ability to resurrect any NPC. 
Falmer Bound Bow Spell - 36 base Damage (Not effected by the Mystic Binding Perk) 
(Vanilla Bound Bow is 24 base Damage with the Mystic Binding Perk)
While your character is a Vampire, you will have custom Vampire Wings & Eyes!
(Female Vampire wings are more petite in this version) 

Falmer Blooded Ability 
No falling Damage, for those that love mountain jumping.
Learn more From Skill Books.
Learn skills 4x faster.
2x Tempering Health
Pickpocket Equipped Items

MORE INTIMIDATION, your a Snow Elf remember, everyones weary.

Add 4 More Enchantments to Items (if you have the Extra Effect perk, it may be ignored)
Learn all Ingredient Effects (if you have any of the Experimenter perks, it may be ignored)
10 more Ingredients Harvested (if you have the Green Thumb perk, it may be ignored)
IF YOU DON\'T HAVE THOSE PERKS, IT WILL WORK. 
SELECTING THOSE PERKS WHILE USING THIS MOD, WILL ADD TO THE ABOVE VALUES.

Credit goes to Guffeh, for permission to use his wings mesh.

If you like the work done with this mod, Plese Endorse it.
I accept donations, If you feel like giving something back.
author: MontaugeX
